description: Instant cash back at over 140 retailers
notes: You need to make an account at STACK in order to get a card. Support us by using the referral link! ($5 sign-up bonus)
The FX fees are refunded when you make a minimum of $350 CAD in purchases per month
STACK has its own in-app offers (just like Amex) where you can get relatively high cash back/reward rates
